rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {W}.)[/i]
Tarhild Hall enters tapped unless you control a Mountain and a Swamp.
{1}{R}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Tarhild Hall: Unearth target artifact or creature card. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To unearth an artifact or creature card., return it from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
